name: gaia-blog
description: Personal convenience scripts for blog workflow

scripts.redate: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),path=require('path'),f=process.argv[1],d=new Date().toISOString().slice(0,10);let c=fs.readFileSync(f,'utf8');c=c.replace(/^date:\s*.+$/m,'date: '+d);fs.writeFileSync(f,c);const dir=path.dirname(f),name=path.basename(f),m=name.match(/^\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}-(.+)$/);if(m&&path.basename(dir)==='_posts'){const newName=d+'-'+m[1],newPath=path.join(dir,newName);if(newName!==name){fs.renameSync(f,newPath);console.log('✓ Updated to:',d,'\n✓ Renamed:',newName);}else{console.log('✓ Updated to:',d);}}else{console.log('✓ Updated to:',d);}"
